body.name: TOA-060 Air Fryer Basket for Oven, Stainless Steel Oven Air Fryer Basket and Tray Compatible with Cuisinart Air fryer TOA-060 and TOA-065, Non-stick Mesh Basket for Convection Toaster Oven

features: PERFECTLY COMPATIBLE: Our TOA-060 oven air fryer basket and tray compatible with Cuisinart air fryer TOA-060 and TOA-065 ovens. Perfect for cooking, steak, vegetables, fish, french fries ,pizza, chicken wings multiple foods

SAFE COOKING: The air fryer basket for oven are made of high quality food grade 304 stainless steel, BPA free and FDA compliant; the stainless steel baking pans are sturdy and heat resistant, safe to use at temperatures up to 450℉. You can use it for a long time without frequent replacement.

EVEN HEATING: The TOA-060 air fryer baskets are designed with an ultra-fine mesh basket that evenly distributes the heat to fully touch the food, ensuring that the food is heated evenly and no excess fat remains, which means you can enjoy your favorite fried foods without worrying about added calories and fat. So even conventional ovens can run and fry any food using convection technology for more healthy cooking and great taste.

EASY TO CLEAN: Stainless steel air fryer basket and tray has a non-stick surface, so even if some food sticks to it, it will come right off after a quick soak; the air fry basket is dishwasher safe, which makes cleanup almost effortless and frees your hands!

MULTI-PURPOSE BAKING BASKET: Air fryer pans for oven can meet all kitchen needs and can be used for both commercial and home use. Perfect for baking homemade pizzas, chicken nuggets, sandwiches, chips and more. Ideal for everyday cooking, family dinners, friends gatherings, holiday celebrations and more. We offer 24 hours friendly service and one year warranty promise, if you receive any problem with the product, please contact us promptly and we will solve it for you first!
body.description: TOA-060 oven air fryer basket and tray compatible with Cuisinart air fryer TOA-060 and TOA-065 ovens. Perfect for cooking, steak, vegetables, fish, french fries ,pizza, chicken wings multiple foods Non-Stick toaster oven pans are the perfect addition to any kitchen, whether you're a seasoned cook or just starting out. With their easy-to-use design, superior quality, and versatility, these baking sheets are sure to become a go-to bakeware for all your air frying needs. MESH BASKET The air fryer accessories are designed with an ultra-fine mesh basket that evenly distributes the heat to fully touch the food, ensuring that the food is heated evenly and no excess fat remains, which means you can enjoy your favorite fried foods without worrying about added calories and fat. So even conventional ovens can run and fry any food using convection technology for more healthy cooking and great taste. WHAT MAKES IT SO GREAT: IDEAL BAKING PAN FOR OVENS - heating more evenly and quickly, food does not need to be turned and will not burn. SAFER TO USE - oven safe at 450° and dishwasher safe HEALTHY MATERIAL - Food grade carbon steel baking sheets are made of food-grade material, PTFE/ PFOA/PFOS Free FRIENDLY DESIGN - Rounded design does not hurt the hand, mesh design is more suitable as a air fry basket for convection oven. EASY TO CLEAN: The air fryer stainless steel basket has a non-stick surface, so even if some food sticks to it, it will come right off after a quick soak; the air fry basket is dishwasher safe, which makes cleanup almost effortless and frees your hands!

reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works Well As Long As You Don't Mind a Perpetually Discolored Basket
reviews.reviewText: Expect this to turn to a black charred color after just a month of use, but it's durable and otherwise a nice replacement for the OEM airfryer part which does the identical thing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great replacement part. Fits exactly as it should.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I needed a replacement for my air fryer because my other one was so old. This fit perfectly in my Cuisinart air fryer. I recommend this to everyone.
